cause.description:
There are too many children in todays society that are suffering from child abuse. any little amount would go along way to help us to stop any child. it can ahppen to any child from any background. so please even if it is just one penny donate to us. invite your friends to show a huge awareness that people can not get away with this any longer.
1. children must live free from harm and tourture
2. children should live in love with hope.
3. children should not be frightened of what the next day might bring.
cause.mission: stop child abuse through making people aware
cause.name: keep kids safe
